title: Out of the Park: The GRAND SLAM
body_text:
Sometimes things just happen... Then ECD's grand Writer looks deep into his endless statistical treasures and finds yet another sparkling gem, only this time he plans to unveil it at the most opportune time.
Below is a unique graphic of those select individuals who have headlined each of the four major ECD events. Trust that not all of them were planned; in fact, the Writer never noticed until the last ECD reunion in March!
